subject: Football
lead_paragraph: As part of his preparation for Sunday's game at Green Bay, Jets Coach Eric Mangini showed his team on Friday a clip of the 1967 N.F.L. championship game between the Packers and the Dallas Cowboys.
snippet: As part of his preparation for Sunday's game at Green Bay, Jets Coach Eric Mangini showed his team on Friday a clip of the 1967 N.F.L. championship game between the Packers and the Dallas Cowboys.
